snippet: The Red Sox agreed to a three-year, $39 million contract with Mike Napoli on Monday, pending a physical exam, bringing a right-handed power hitter to Fenway Park.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox sign infielder Mike Napoli to a three-year, $39 million contract; other baseball developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox agreed to a three-year, $39 million contract with Mike Napoli on Monday, pending a physical exam, bringing a right-handed power hitter to Fenway Park.

headline.seo: Spending Again, Red Sox Add Power by Signing Napoli
headline.main: Spending Again, Red Sox Add Power by Signing Napoli; the Giants Keep Pagan
headline.print_headline: Spending Again, Red Sox Add Power by Signing Napoli; the Giants Keep Pagan
